name: The Ghostly Godfather
description:
So sorry about making you download the game to play it, I wanted to make an html file but it wasn't wanting to work!

This game was made for Round 1 of Season 1 of the Dev League! I hope you all enjoy and the theme was Unfinished Business! This was made in 14 hours out of the 24 we had. 

CONTROLS

W / Up Arrow = Up

A / Left Arrow = Left

S / Down Arrow = Down

D / Right Arrow = Right

Left Click Shoot

Enemy Stats - Normal - Health: 10 Speed: 5 Fire Frequency: 5 - Strong (Red) - Health: 15 Speed: 3 Fire Frequency: 7 - Fast (Yellow) - Health: 7 Speed: 7 Fire Frequency: 3 - Spawner (Blue) - Health: 10 Speed: 5 Spawn Frequency: 5 - Godfather - Health: 50 Speed: 5 Normal Spawn Frequency: 3 Strong/Fast Spawn Frequency: 7 Spawner Spawn Frequency: 10
